thread.title: Portland Mercado hosts oral history project (photos)
thread.title_full: Portland Mercado hosts oral history project (photos) | OregonLive.com

author: Molly Harbarger | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland Mercado hosts oral history project (photos)
text:
On the last day of the Inheritance Stories exhibit at the Portland Mercado , the organizers set up a mic to record more stories for the next showing.
The interactive exhibit features audio stories from immigrants involved in food and agriculture in Oregon. The project was birthed from the local Underground Airwaves podcast, a show Chris Siegel puts together, featuring stories from people involved in the growing, making and consuming of food.
The Oregonian/Oregonlive will write about the project in more detail later this week, a story that will include some of the audio stories as well.
